text.div:
AllergyIntoleranceSubjectfamilySearchParameter

Parameter subject.family:string

Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.family={familyName}
ResourceAllergyIntolerance
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesAllergyIntolerance
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: AllergyIntoleranceSubjectfamilySearchParameter
description: Searches for AllergyIntolerance based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.family={familyName}
